name: No Flux Finish
script:
if ak.ai() then return end
local checks = {
	["choke"] = {[1] = "weariness",[2] = "nausea"},
	["roil"] = {[1] = "weariness",[2] = "asthma"},
	["parch"] = {[1] = "weariness",[2] = "haemophilia"},
	["drench"] = {[1] = "asthma",[2] = "slickness",[3] = "anorexia"},
}
if ak.fluxline and ak.fluxline == matches[1] then return end
ak.fluxcheck = ak.fluxcheck or "unknown"
if not table.contains(checks, ak.fluxcheck) then
	disableTrigger("Flux Enhance")
	return 
end
--cecho("<cyan>Non-Flux: <white>"..ak.fluxcheck)
if ak.fluxcheck == "drench" then

else
	if affstrack.score[checks[ak.fluxcheck][1]] == 100 and affstrack.score[checks[ak.fluxcheck][2]] < 100 then
		--cecho("<cyan>\nCheck Flux: <white>"..checks[ak.fluxcheck][2])
		ak.thoughtIhad(checks[ak.fluxcheck][2])
	elseif affstrack.score[checks[ak.fluxcheck][1]] < 100 and affstrack.score[checks[ak.fluxcheck][2]] == 100 then
		--cecho("<cyan>\nCheck Flux: <white>"..checks[ak.fluxcheck][1])
		ak.thoughtIhad(checks[ak.fluxcheck][1])
	else
	
	end	
end
disableTrigger("Flux Enhance")
matches: ^You force ([\w'\-]+) into a state of heightened perspiring\.$
^You wave a hand casually in the direction of ([\w'\-]+)\, violently roiling the liquid within [\w'\-]+ stomach\.$
^You wave a hand in the direction of ([\w'\-]+) roiling the liquid that flows throughout [\w'\-]+ and disrupting [\w'\-]+ mental stability\.$
^You manifest water inside the lungs of ([\w'\-]+)\, causing [\w'\-]+ to hack and cough violently\.$
^You call down a deluge to drench the impudent ([\w'\-]+)\, soaking [\w'\-]+ with icy water\.$
^You call down a deluge to drench the impudent ([\w'\-]+)\, leaving [\w'\-]+ dazed and confused\.$
^You leech the water from ([\w'\-]+)\, making [\w'\-]+ skin dry and cracked\.$
^You exert your limited control of the blood that flows through the veins of ([\w'\-]+)\, thinning it\.$
^You violently pull on the thinned blood flowing through the inferior form of ([\w'\-]+)\.$
^Tendrils of water lash out from you\, latching themselves to ([\w'\-]+) and hindering [\w'\-]+ attempts to flee\.$
^You reach for the blood that flows through the inferior form of ([\w'\-]+)\, latching on and drawing it out\.$
^With an exertion of will\, you reach passed flesh and viscera\, seizing control of every drop of water that flows throughout the walking corpse that is ([\w'\-]+)\.$
